div.div: List of compounds identified in male femoral secretions of the lizard Gallotia galloti.
div.p: Three subspecies were sampled: G.g. eisentrauti, G.g. galloti and G.g. palmae in the reproductive (R: april) and non-reproductive (NR: december) seasons. The relative proportion of each component was determined as the percent of the total ion current (TIC proportion) and reported as the mean (Â±1SD). Characteristic ions (m/z) are reported for unidentified compounds. RT: Retention time.
